Occasionally, I get the urge to post about other fandoms.

blog.name: bigstarkenergy
blog.title: still working on believing
blog.description: jordan | writer | stevetony | ace | anti-st*rker

summary: the idea that tony brushes off people “smarter” than him is hilarious  like, i’m sorry, are we talking about the same tony stark...
body:
the idea that tony brushes off people “smarter” than him is hilarious 

like, i’m sorry, are we talking about the same tony stark i know? the one who:

  • listened to a young CHILD’S idea and praised him for it, saying “that’s a good idea, actually, i might do that”
  • said the the plan was for a WOMAN’s invention to leave his own inventions in the fucking dust
  • complimented bruce banner’s intellect and said that his work was “unparalleled”
  • called pepper the most capable person he knows

lmao y’all need to watch the fucking movies first, please and thank you

blog.name: formydarkestdays
blog.title: formydarkestdays
blog.description:
For my random thoughts and shit. Might get back into fan fictions

who knows

she/they

main: @abuskinswarrior

summary: Hi, dear! May I get a Marvel male ship? I am a 5’3 girl with dark wavy hair and big hazel eyes, I am very sassy and sarcastic...
question: Hi, dear! May I get a Marvel male ship? I am a 5’3 girl with dark wavy hair and big hazel eyes, I am very sassy and sarcastic and may seem rude at first. I love acting. I always wear dresses and heels, but although I look like a pretty little flower, I can kick someone’s ass easily. I always seem arrogant and rude, but in real life I am just a misunderstood person with a pretty good heart, but a filthy mouth. I am flirty and can charm my way out of Any situation. Thank you 😊
answer:
I feel like people always under estimate me when I say I can and will kick their ass.

I ship you with…

Iron Man!!!!! 

~ You meet when you are at a party that he was hosting
~ You were in trouble with the security for being somewhere you shouldn’t and Tony took a liking to you
~ You guys played the long game of flirting back and forth and it wasn’t until the events of Avengers movie that you realized you were genuinely afraid for his life
~ He asked you right after the a press meeting and you just kissed him
~ “Wow, if I had known that was in store, I would have asked you a long time ago.” “Please, you couldn’t get me until now.”
~ He loves walking behind you because he stares at your ass, so you add a little umph to your walk just to be a tease.
~ Helping him overcome some of his anxiety and ptsd, but you still worry every time he leaves for a mission
~ Everyone hates the couple that you are, just two arrogant people, but you know what you have 
~ You and Pepper get along too well and it concerns Tony 
~ Waking up in the morning to Tony sprawled across your body and you have shove him off of you 
~ Nights in involve Tony teaching you how to be a mechanic and you purposely messing up so you can see his muscles at work
~ The first time you sparred with him, he was not prepared and you knocked him on his ass.

Tony seems likes he’s all fake, but you’ve seen him break down behind closed doors and you are his strength. You keep him going.

blog.name: fanficfaerieshistoricalaulibrary
blog.title: FanficFaerie's Historical AU Library
blog.description: Here you will find Historical and Fairytale AUs.

summary: The Winter King - Chapter 1 - MarvelousMenagerie (HiddenOne) - Marvel [Archive of Our Own]
title: The Winter King - Chapter 1 - MarvelousMenagerie (HiddenOne) - Marvel [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/2
Fandom: Marvel, Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe, Alternate Universe - Fairy Tale, Cold Weather, almost freezing to death, Tale of the Frost King, with elements from Bear and the Nightingale
Series: Part 4 of 2018 Stony Fairy Tale Bingo
Summary:

Tony has more than one reason to be out wandering late at night in the middle of winter.

“What brings such a stubborn creature as you out into the woods tonight?”
Tony grins wider, now that his face can move again. “My stepfather has chosen me as an offering to the Winter King.” Or to die, really, because Obadiah did not believe in the old gods.
Tony believed. He had seen them.

UPDATE: Now includes ART!

Wing AU - Characters have wings

summary: The Traditional Omega - Katieb18 - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: The Traditional Omega - Katieb18 - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 7/?
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: Explicit
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), Pepper Potts
Additional Tags: Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Omega Tony Stark, Alpha Steve Rogers, Spanking, Public Sex, corner time, Knotting, Marking, Loving Steve, Cute Tony Stark, Domestic Discipline, Domestic Avengers, Fluff, Tony has everyone wrapped around his little finger, Steve doesn’t care, Cuddling & Snuggling, Platonic Cuddling, Naked Cuddling, Everyone loves cuddling Tony, Tony loves the cuddles, Smut, Orgasm Delay/Denial, Coming Untouched, Orgasm Control, Fluff and Smut, Public Nudity, Public Masturbation, Dubious Consent, kind of
Summary:

Steve is a traditional Alpha and he wants Tony Stark as a Mate. Tony want’s it too but doesn’t know if he could live the traditional life. Steve and Tony come together during Tony’s heat. Once Steve and Tony are mated Steve sets to teach him how to be his perfect Omega which Tony surprisingly loves once he comes to terms with it. The road to that acceptance though is full of bumps and Tony doesn’t make it one bit easy for Steve. Luckily Steve loves a challenge.

*slight dub-con in the first chapter. Will be expanded on more in second chapter*

blog.name: quotablefanfiction
blog.title: Quotable Fanfiction
blog.description: This is a collection of quotes from different fanfiction stories we've read over the years.  They're also recommendations, for it's rare that we find a story worth quoting without enjoying it in some way.

summary:
I know how much I hated being told I couldn’t.  I also know how well I listened.” 
“I’m going out on a limb here and saying ‘not...
text:
I know how much I hated being told I couldn’t.  I also know how well I listened.”
“I’m going out on a limb here and saying ‘not well,’” Tony remarked.
“Not well,” Steve affirmed.  “That’s…something of an understatement, but let’s go with that.
source:
Steve and Tony (chp. 2*) *5 by text

blog.name: incorrectavengersquotes
blog.title: Incorrect Avengers Quotes
blog.description: Submit! Ask! About!

summary: Tony: Pepper, when you put it like that, it sounds like we really half-assed this product. Well done—that's exactly what we want...
body:
Tony: Pepper, when you put it like that, it sounds like we really half-assed this product. Well done—that's exactly what we want to do. If you can give quarter of an ass, that's even better.
Pepper: Does that mean they're going to like it?
Tony: Who knows, Pepper? Who knows, and who cares?
Pepper: We care!
Tony: Oh God, we care, Pepper! Oh God, I forgot the fact we really care!

dialogue.name: Tony
dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: Pepper, when you put it like that, it sounds like we really half-assed this product. Well done—that's exactly what we want to do. If you can give quarter of an ass, that's even better.

dialogue.name: Pepper
dialogue.label: Pepper:
dialogue.phrase: Does that mean they're going to like it?

dialogue.name: Tony
dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: Who knows, Pepper? Who knows, and who cares?

dialogue.name: Tony
dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: Oh God, we care, Pepper! Oh God, I forgot the fact we really care!

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: The Beginning
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ydtf5F

by The_Raptor_Queen

Seto Kaiba has a secret ability, one that he’s kept hidden from most people for much of his life. With Tony Stark’s help, he creates an AI to help hide this ability. This is the beginning of their story…

Words: 1987, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of The Technopath

  • Fandoms: Yu-Gi-Oh! - All Media Types, Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

blog.name: masterlokisev159
blog.title: Fight like you're an Avenger
blog.description: So in my spare time, I like growing another chin while scrolling tumblr and very occasionally posting stony fics on AO3 ;) Okay, maybe I might post some other stuff idk, depends on how long lectures take :P Come say hi if you love Tony or Steve or any of the Mavrel crew honestly. They're all beautiful and so are you!

summary: Hold me up and don’t let go
title: Hold me up and don’t let go
body:
https://archiveofourown.org/works/18180842

Summary: Tony’s not been doing too well since Siberia. Too many fights are leaving too many bruises and it’s only getting worse. Peter is worried. He doesn’t know what to do. Turns out, so is Steve.

A story following the events of Civil War where Tony goes too far and nearly gets himself killed. Steve and Peter refuse to let that happen.

Another post-Civil War fic! Features underwater kissing, protective Steve, worried Peter and much more!

Please do have a read and let me know what you think!

blog.name: thefandomimagine
blog.title: The Fandom Imagine
blog.description: Buy Me A Coffee Patreon Page WARNING:These tags do include NSFW posts Marvel Doctor Who Harry Potter LOTR Sherlock Supernatural Star Wars OUAT Teen Wolf DC Others Oneshots Aesthetic Fake Texts Headcanons Moodboards NSFW An imagines blog for any and all fandoms. Please note that I do not own any of the gifs used and if you see any of your own gifs, then message me and I will happily put your name in the tags, to give credit where credit is due or remove it if that is what you wish. You are always welcome to write stories based on any of the imagines I myself will do gif imagines, fake texts, aesthetics and headcanons. However any oneshots on the blog are wrote by followers. If you wish to submit a oneshot idea than I will post it to everyone, however it is up to them if it is actually published. NSFW posts are published on the last Sunday of the month. All fandoms are welcome.

blog.name: amethyst-noir
blog.title: Whatever it takes. 🌙
blog.description:
🦋
99% Ironstrange | drpepperony is 💞 | sometimes i write | sometimes i just imagine things | my inbox is always open | Arbonne@AO3 | cute chibi!stephen commissioned from @descaladumidera | beautiful header by @ironstrange-is-the-endgame
💫

summary: Okay, but what do you think about the trope that Tony used the vibranium shield to strengthen his sternum after Siberia? Not in...
question: Okay, but what do you think about the trope that Tony used the vibranium shield to strengthen his sternum after Siberia? Not in a petty kind of way (I don't like character bashing, so Tony doesn't want to get back at Steve that way), but because he doesn't have another choice.
answer:
Really? That’s a trope? I can’t say that I have thought about it, to be honest. I headcanon that Tony got a ton of implants after the arc reactor was removed and that they protected his heart when Steven destroyed the reactor of the suit. I think that the undersuit is made of something tougher than kevlar so his chest should be protected against open wounds but that still leaves the brute force of Steve’s attack. (Calm down, Steve, okay? We’re all friends here.)

So the implants had to be replaced. By newer, better ones. Maybe there is vibranium involved, it wouldn’t surprise me. But if it’s there it’s because is the best material for the purpose, not for any other way.

Tony knows that he has to get back on his feet and in fighting shape ASAP after Siberia. The big threat is approaching and he simply doesn’t have the time for thoughts about petty vengeance. (It totally understand and support him in not calling Steve, though.)

(I headcanon that he only heals as fast and well as he does because of Extremis. Might also explain his still stunning looks despite his high-stress life. 🤣)

I’m not a fan of the idea of Tony having a new arc reactor in his chest and prefer that by now he has quite a bit of nanotech in his body. (And Nebula, sadly, has a lot of experience with enhancements like that and I halfway expect her helping Tony to integrate some of that tech into his body/his suit.) The reactor on his chest is the housing unit for the particles but not longer needed to keep him alive.

Locutus Tony, the Borg. Sorry.

(I want Pepper and/or Stephen to be able to rest their heads on Tony’s shoulder/chest without it causing him too much pain and them having cold metal in their faces; I freely admit that that’s part of why I think like that. Tony’s not a nightlight!)

reblog.comment:
Really? That’s a trope? I can’t say that I have thought about it, to be honest. I headcanon that Tony got a ton of implants after the arc reactor was removed and that they protected his heart when Steven destroyed the reactor of the suit. I think that the undersuit is made of something tougher than kevlar so his chest should be protected against open wounds but that still leaves the brute force of Steve’s attack. (Calm down, Steve, okay? We’re all friends here.)

So the implants had to be replaced. By newer, better ones. Maybe there is vibranium involved, it wouldn’t surprise me. But if it’s there it’s because is the best material for the purpose, not for any other way.

Tony knows that he has to get back on his feet and in fighting shape ASAP after Siberia. The big threat is approaching and he simply doesn’t have the time for thoughts about petty vengeance. (It totally understand and support him in not calling Steve, though.)

(I headcanon that he only heals as fast and well as he does because of Extremis. Might also explain his still stunning looks despite his high-stress life. 🤣)

I’m not a fan of the idea of Tony having a new arc reactor in his chest and prefer that by now he has quite a bit of nanotech in his body. (And Nebula, sadly, has a lot of experience with enhancements like that and I halfway expect her helping Tony to integrate some of that tech into his body/his suit.) The reactor on his chest is the housing unit for the particles but not longer needed to keep him alive.

Locutus Tony, the Borg. Sorry.

(I want Pepper and/or Stephen to be able to rest their heads on Tony’s shoulder/chest without it causing him too much pain and them having cold metal in their faces; I freely admit that that’s part of why I think like that. Tony’s not a nightlight!)

trail.content_raw:
Really? That’s a trope? I can’t say that I have thought about it, to be honest. I headcanon that Tony got a ton of implants after the arc reactor was removed and that they protected his heart when Steven destroyed the reactor of the suit. I think that the undersuit is made of something tougher than kevlar so his chest should be protected against open wounds but that still leaves the brute force of Steve’s attack. (Calm down, Steve, okay? We’re all friends here.)

So the implants had to be replaced. By newer, better ones. Maybe there is vibranium involved, it wouldn’t surprise me. But if it’s there it’s because is the best material for the purpose, not for any other way.

Tony knows that he has to get back on his feet and in fighting shape ASAP after Siberia. The big threat is approaching and he simply doesn’t have the time for thoughts about petty vengeance. (It totally understand and support him in not calling Steve, though.)

(I headcanon that he only heals as fast and well as he does because of Extremis. Might also explain his still stunning looks despite his high-stress life. 🤣)

I’m not a fan of the idea of Tony having a new arc reactor in his chest and prefer that by now he has quite a bit of nanotech in his body. (And Nebula, sadly, has a lot of experience with enhancements like that and I halfway expect her helping Tony to integrate some of that tech into his body/his suit.) The reactor on his chest is the housing unit for the particles but not longer needed to keep him alive.

Locutus Tony, the Borg. Sorry.

(I want Pepper and/or Stephen to be able to rest their heads on Tony’s shoulder/chest without it causing him too much pain and them having cold metal in their faces; I freely admit that that’s part of why I think like that. Tony’s not a nightlight!)
